item.title: Lewis Hamilton reveals his father’s confusion on calling 7-time World Champion ‘Sir’ after knighthood
item.description: Lewis Hamilton reveals his father’s confusion on calling 7-time World Champion ‘Sir’ after knighthood Lewis Hamilton revealed that his niece and nephew call him “Sir Uncle” while his father was confused after Prince Charles knighted the Mercedes driver.
